container_stats.name: controller_num_iops
container_stats.description: Number of IOPS (read and write) serviced by this container

container_stats.name: controller_num_write_iops
container_stats.description: Number of write IOPS at this container

container_stats.name: controller_io_bandwidth_kBps
container_stats.description: Combined IO bandwidth (read and write) on this container in KB/s

container_stats.name: controller_read_io_bandwidth_kBps
container_stats.description: Overall IO read bandwidth on this container in KB/s

container_stats.name: controller_write_io_bandwidth_kBps
container_stats.description: Overall IO write bandwidth on this container in KB/s

container_stats.name: controller_avg_io_latency_usecs
container_stats.description: Average IO response time combined reads and writes in uSec on this container

container_stats.name: controller_avg_read_io_latency_usecs
container_stats.description: Average IO response time for reads in uSec on this container

container_stats.name: controller_avg_write_io_latency_usecs
container_stats.description: Average IO response time for writes in uSec on this container
